courseForPageBlockSections.description: In block 4, we will talk about the automation and optimization of different processes. It provides an overview of complex field types (calculated and rollup) and form operations automation. You will also explore the most powerful standard features —  workflows and their comparison with plugins; Business Process Flow as a modern tool to create guided user scenarios.

In block 4, we will talk about the automation and optimization of different processes. It provides an overview of complex field types (calculated and rollup) and form operations automation. You will also explore the most powerful standard features —  workflows and their comparison with plugins; Business Process Flow as a modern tool to create guided user scenarios.

mentor.biography: MS Dynamics 365 Consultant / Project manager with four-year experience in commerce and a bundle of successful American, Finnish and German projects. Slava has a thing for MS Dynamics 365, uses a systematic approach, and follows all trends.

courseForPageBlockSections.description: Block 6 is about security. It touches upon all aspects of Dynamics 365 security model, including the system roles, user/teams configuration, organizational structure, and field security profiles. Also, it includes an overview of a powerful tracking tool — Audit and System Settings; including system jobs and data duplicate detection. As a bonus, we added to this block a brief overview of XRM  Toolbox - 3rd party product that eases lots of work with Dynamics 365.

courseForPageBlockSections.description: This block is about fundamental interface components: forms, views, charts, and dashboards. You will learn how to use them effectively and how to configure and create new interface components. Also, it includes an overview of Advanced Find tool.

courseForPageBlockSections.description: Summary. It is a brief overview of all Power Platform features and different Power Apps products, like Power Automate, PowerBI, and Power Virtual Agents. Also, you will overview Microsoft 365 (Office 365) plans and Dynamics 365 licenses. As a bonus, we added an overview and a little comparison case of the latest Unified Interface.

pricePlans.description:
Free plan is designated for everyone willing and eager to become a member of UDS team. On the successful completion of the course, we afford soft ground for students to apply for Junior Microsoft Dynamics 365 Consultant in UDS Systems.

  • small-group format (up to 6 students);

  • short course (2 weeks only);

  • mentor's assistance;

  • practical assignments similar to the tasks of real projects;

  • check of home assignment;

  • employment in UDS Systems;

  • we recruit a group of students only two times a year (when the need to expand current projects arises).
